values.help: Output load will be closed after 30 seconds if the current exceeds (US: 15.5A, AU or EU: 10.5A).
values.label: Over current protection

values.help: Output load will be closed after 30 seconds if the temperature inside the product exceeds 100C.
values.label: Over heat protection

values.help: Configure the output load status after re-power on
values.label: Status re-power on

items.label: The last status before the power outage

values.help: To set which notification would be sent to the associated nodes in association group 1 when the state of output load is changed
values.label: Notification report association group 1

items.label: Hail CC when using the external switch to switch the loads

values.help: To set which notification would be sent to the associated nodes in association group 3 when using the external switch 1 to switch the loads
values.label: Notification report using the external switch 1

values.help: To set which notification would be sent to the associated nodes in association group 4 when using the external switch 2 to switch the loads
values.label: Notification report using the external switch 2

values.help: Configure the state of LED when it is in 3 modes below
values.label: LED status

items.label: The LED will follow the status
LED will follow the status (on/off) of its load but the LED will turn off after 5 seconds

values.help:
Value1: Hour of ON.
			Value2: Minute of ON.
			Value3: Hour of OFF.
			Value4: Minute of OFF.
			E.g. The default setting is the Night light mode is enabled at 12: 00 and disabled at 8:00.
values.label: Time set for Night light mode

values.help:
Value1: 0= Disable / 1= Enable. 
			Value2: Weekday (Bit 0-6 means Monday to Sunday).
			Value3: Hour of turning ON.
			Value4: Minute of turning ON
			E.g. The default setting 0x001207F00
values.label: Time set for the turning on the output load

values.help:
Value1: 0= Disable / 1= Enable. 
			Value2: Weekday (Bit 0-6 means Monday to Sunday).
			Value3: Hour of turning OFF.
			Value4: Minute of turning OFF
			E.g. The default setting 0x001707F00
values.label: Time set for the turning OFF the output load

values.help: If this parameter is set to 1 (Enable), the parameter 101 - 103 should be set to 0.
values.label: Enable/disable the parameter 91 and 92

values.help: The value represents the minimum change in wattage for a Report to be sent (default 25 W)
values.label: Minimum Change to send Report (Watt)

values.help: The value represents the minimum percentage change in wattage for a Report to be sent (Default 5)
values.label: Minimum Change to send Report (%)

values.help: Set report types for groups 1, 2 and 3 to default.
values.label: Default Group Reports

values.help:
Defines the type of report sent for reporting group 1.
			  1 is meter report for voltage.
			  2 is meter report for current.
			  4 is meter report for watts.
			  8 is meter report for kilowatts.
		 Value 1 (msb) Reserved
		 Value 2 Reserved
		 Value 3 Reserved
		 Value 4 (lsb) bits 7-4 reserved
			  bit 3 current
			  bit 2 voltage
			  bit 1 watt
			  bit 0 kWh
values.label: Report type sent in Reporting Group 1

values.help:
Defines the type of report sent for reporting group 2.
			  1 is meter report for voltage.
			  2 is meter report for current.
			  4 is meter report for watts.
			  8 is meter report for kilowatts.
		 Value 1 (msb) Reserved
		 Value 2 Reserved
		 Value 3 Reserved
		 Value 4 (lsb) bits 7-4 reserved
			  bit 3 current
			  bit 2 voltage
			  bit 1 watt
			  bit 0 kWh
values.label: Report type sent in Reporting Group 2

values.help:
Defines the type of report sent for reporting group 3.
			  1 is meter report for voltage.
			  2 is meter report for current.
			  4 is meter report for watts.
			  8 is meter report for kilowatts.
		 Value 1 (msb) Reserved
		 Value 2 Reserved
		 Value 3 Reserved
		 Value 4 (lsb) bits 7-4 reserved
			  bit 3 current
			  bit 2 voltage
			  bit 1 watt
			  bit 0 kWh
values.label: Report type sent in Reporting Group 3

values.help: Set time interval for sending reports for groups 1, 2 and 3 to default.
values.label: Set 111-113 to default

values.help: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 1 is sent.
values.label: Send Interval for Reporting Group 1

values.help: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 2 is sent.
values.label: Send Interval for Reporting Group 2

values.help: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 3 is sent.
values.label: Send Interval for Reporting Group 3
